data.text: To e iyeno bende ipenjo ni, ‘Mano to konya gangʼo,
Ka umedo timo richo, to obadhe gangʼo?
Ka un joma kare to bedou makare miye angʼo,
Timbeu maricho hinyo mana dhano machal kodu,
“Ji ywak malit nikech tingʼ mapek moyie kuomgi;
To onge ngʼato kuomgi mawachoe ni,
mapuonjowa gik mathoth moloyo kaka opuonjo le manie piny
Adier, Nyasaye ok chik ite ne ywakgi
Iwacho ni Nyasaye ok winj wecheni
Bende imedo wacho ni kata ji ok okum gi mirimbe mager
Omiyo Ayub wuoyo ka ngʼama ofuwo;
